description: Three new machines will ensure tests are done ¡°quickly and efficiently¡±, a Manx minister says.
title: New ECG machines will 'improve patient experience' at Isle of Man hospital
title_page: New ECG machines will 'improve patient experience' at Isle of Man hospital - BBC News
maintext: Two of the devices will be used in the emergency department - which previously had only one - while the third will be used on the children's ward.
